edu.gatech.cs2340.trydent.math.curve

Interface Interpolation<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of object to interpolate
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    KeyframeInterpolation

    public interface Interpolation<T>
    Interpolation strategy interface.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Interpolation<BaseVector<?>> SMOOTH
      Performs a smooth (cubic B-spline) interpolation between points.
      static Interpolation<BaseVector<?>> STRAIGHT
      Performs a straight-line interpolation between points.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T interpolate(double t, PointStream<T> points)
      Interpolates between the current and next points on the input stream by an the interpolation parameter t.

    • Field Detail

      • STRAIGHT

        static final Interpolation<BaseVector<?>> STRAIGHT
        Performs a straight-line interpolation between points. (Also known as a linear interpolation or "lerp".)

      • SMOOTH

        static final Interpolation<BaseVector<?>> SMOOTH
        Performs a smooth (cubic B-spline) interpolation between points.

    • Method Detail

      • interpolate

        T interpolate(double t,
              PointStream<T> points)
        Interpolates between the current and next points on the input stream by an the interpolation parameter t.
        Parameters:
        t - - where t=0 returns points.current(), and t=1 returns points.next().
        points - - abstract polyline to interpolate along.
        Returns:
        the interpolated point of type T
